channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16151] what's wrong when using bulkload to load file to table in hbase ?
item.description:
here is the code and logs below:
HTable table = new HTable(tempConf,tableName);
LoadIncrementalHFiles loader = new LoadIncrementalHFiles(conf);
loader.doBulkLoad(dir, table);

item.summary: what's wrong when using bulkload to load file to table in hbase ?

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please use the mail list of user@hbase.apache.org or dev@hbase.apache.org to ask such questions, and please add your server side log in your email. Will close this JIRA now.
